articles.author: BECKY BOHRER, MATTHEW DALY
articles.title: Biden administration restricts oil and gas leasing in 13 million acres of Alaska's petroleum reserve - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. oil industry’s top lobbying group says Biden administration rules restricting oil and gas leasing in 13 million acres of Alaska’s petroleum reserve are “misguided.″ The American Petroleum Institute says the rules limit development in a region “intend…
articles.content: JUNEAU, Alaska (AP) The Biden administration said Friday it will restrict new oil and gas leasing on 13 million acres (5.3 million hectares) of a federal petroleum reserve in Alaska to help protect w… [+5815 chars]
